rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall designed to welcome guests with Vastu-aligned layout. The room has a north-east facing entrance, aligning with the positive energy flow.
An expansive living area located towards the south-west corner of the central courtyard for balanced energy distribution. Features large windows on the southern side to let in sunlight.
Adjacent to the living room, this dining area is designed with east-facing windows and a Vastu-compliant layout, enhancing digestive health.
A modern kitchen placed in the north-east direction with proper ventilation and proximity to water sources. Adheres to Vastu guidelines for healthy living environments.
Guest bedroom positioned on the west side ensuring privacy and soundproofing, with a south-west orientation to promote calmness.

The master suite is located in the north-east quadrant of the floor plan, featuring an ensuite bathroom, walk-in closet, and large windows for natural light. The room's placement adheres to Vastu principles for health and prosperity.
A centrally accessible bathroom with east-facing openings to ensure proper circulation and alignment with Vastu norms.
Integrated storage facilities designed within the west or north-west corner as per Vastu to maintain energy balance.

openings.description: North-east facing main entrance ensuring auspicious entry and positive flow of energy into the farmhouse.
Additional entrance for emergency egress located on the south-west side, providing balance to the layout.

central_courtyard.description: A central courtyard with a natural ventilation design and green space. Includes an integrated swimming pool positioned in the north-east region of the courtyard, complementing Vastu principles for relaxation and stress relief.
